qas.question: On which date was the first governing body for Canadian football formed?
Which governing organization for Canadian football was formed on June 12, 1880?
In which year was the Western Interprovincial Football Union founded?
Which Canadian football union expanded its scope in 1891?
Which organization founded in 1956 evolved into the modern Canadian Football League?

plausible_answers.text: to establish a proper governing body and adopted the current set of Rugby rules

qas.question: The Canadian Rugby football Union was the first attempt at what?
The football Association of Canada was formed on June 12 of what year?
The Canadian rugby union reorganized into what in 1891?
What organization founded in 1880 included teams from Ontario Montréal and Québec?
What organization founded in 1956 evolved from the Canadian football league?
When was the governing body for the CRFU founded?
What umbrella organization was formed on June 12 1880?
When did the Football Association of Canada reorganize to form CRU?
Which organization founded in 1873 became the Canadian Football League?
When were the ORFU and the CRU formed?

context: The first attempt <b5_0>to establish a proper governing body and adopted the current set of Rugby rules<b5_0/> was the Foot Ball Association of Canada, organized on <a0_0><b10_0>March 24, 1873<b10_0/><a0_0/> followed by <b8_0>the <a1_0><a3_0><b11_0>Canadian Rugby Football Union<b11_0/><a3_0/><a1_0/> (CRFU)<b8_0/> founded June 12, <b6_0>1880<b6_0/>, which included teams from Ontario and Quebec. Later both the Ontario and Quebec Rugby Football Union (ORFU and QRFU) were formed (<b14_0>January 1883<b14_0/>), and then the Interprovincial (1907) and Western Interprovincial Football Union (<a2_0>1936<a2_0/>) (IRFU and WIFU). The CRFU reorganized into <b7_0>an umbrella organization<b7_0/> forming the Canadian Rugby Union (CRU) in <b12_0>1891<b12_0/>. The original forerunners to the current Canadian Football League, was established in 1956 when the IRFU and WIFU formed an umbrella organization, <b9_0><b13_0>The <a4_0>Canadian Football Council<b13_0/><b9_0/><a4_0/> (CFC). And then in 1958 the CFC left The CRFU to become The CFL.
